doc.title: Blink
doc.plot: Sandra Miller is a young woman working towards corporate success. But when she lets an unstable friend get fired in order to preserve her own reputation, she finds herself in great danger. Sandra's friend Thomas helped her get started in the industry. A longtime family friend, he has always watched out for her. But when her friend Jeff fails at the job she secured him, even popping pills and drinking at work, Thomas makes it clear that she needs to save herself - at Jeff's expense. After his removal, Jeff's attraction to Sandra, combined with a sense of betrayal, lead him to become dangerously obsessed. The only person she can depend on is Thomas. But can he really protect her?
